description: Defines the mandatory initialization sequence for an external AI agent. It ensures the agent is properly contextualized by loading protocols and scanning for relevant documents before planning.

rules.description: Upon task initialization, the agent MUST first read the root AGENTS.md file to load all operational protocols, and then perform a repository scan for other relevant documentation. This two-step process provides the necessary operational and contextual grounding for the task.
rules.enforcement: This is a mandatory, non-negotiable first step in the agent's lifecycle, enforced by its own core logic before any task-specific plan is formulated.
